darkonealex for me going to 64bit windows fixed problem

@darkonealex - If you are having problems with the game crashing you have to set it to only use one core. For some reason the game goes stupid when it tries to take advantage of more than one core. First off startt the game and hit CTRL-ALT-DEL and open the task manager, go to processes and click the show processes from all users button. After that find the KSP.exe and right click it and choose affinity, deselect all but the first core and enjoy smooth running with no crashes. The only downside to this is you need to do it every time you start Kerbal Space Program. Hope this helps you and anyone else having this issues.
